entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
